name: lesbian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who is sexually or romantically attracted to other women and not to people of other genders: gay men and lesbians
belonging or relating to women who are sexually or romantically attracted to other women and not to people of other genders: They made history by becoming the first lesbian couple to be married in San Francisco. The gay and lesbian community has sought employment protections. The author's latest book is a lesbian love story set in the 1950s.
More examplesFewer examplesShe became the city's first openly lesbian official.She plays the lesbian lover of one of the lead characters.They have been in a committed lesbian relationship since high school.

a woman who is physically attracted to other women
